comment: A deduction theorem for converting the inference ` |- F/_ x A ` => ` |- ph ` into a closed theorem. Use ~ nfa1 and ~ nfab to eliminate the hypothesis of the substitution instance ` ps ` of the inference. For converting the inference form into a deduction form, ~ abidnf is useful. (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2006.)
